author: The Film Theorists
description:
The biggest movie of 2026 is almost here! Following the ancient epic of Rama, Namit Malhotra’s Ramayana is set to be the largest film project to come from India. While we don’t know much as of yet, what we DO know is the music is being co-composed by Hans Zimmer & AR Rahman and insane visual effects from DNEG, this movie is going to be MIND BLOWING!

Thanks to Ramayana for sponsoring this video!
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

Writers: Forrest Lee & Melissa Yinger

Sound Designer: Yosi Berman

title: The Biggest Film of 2026 - Namit Malhotra’s Ramayana
